title: Mafia III Dev Suffers Layoffs - Kinda Funny Games Daily
description:
Thanks to Bombfell for sponsoring this episode. Go to http://Bombfell.com/KindaFunny

Tim and Greg discuss Hangar 13 layoffs, PUBG cheaters, and demonizing games.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:00 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:03:33 - Hangar 13 Layoffs, via Kotaku
00:06:55 - “Have games development community has also been this close knit or if it’s a more recent trend?” - Callum McEwan 
00:09:55 - PUBG Cheaters Update, via Youxi by way of IGN
00:10:30 - NEW SEGMENT: PUBG PC MR MESE
00:13:06 - Persona OA App, via Silicon Era 
00:14:30 - The official list of upcoming games
 Reader mail   -
00:23:50 - "gaming creates killers" stereotype - Justin aka Old Man Hooch
00:26:49 - “But is Sony crazy enough to link Venom to the Spiderman game?” - DrNinja_
00:30:00 - Do you think Cyberpunk will be the Fallout 4 of E3 2018 - Justin
00:35:34 - And what would it take from a game to make it your #1? - Aj (aka numbah93)
00:42:20 - Days Gone release date - Kevin Browne 
00:44:55 - KFGD and other shows on Spotify - Robert Traini (Train-ee)
00:48:17 - Squad Up - psn: waytonever
00:49:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: !?!?!??!?

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
